gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Hawks 139, 76ers 132
gameRecap.excerpt: The Hawks defeated the 76ers, 139-132, in OT. Trae Young recorded 28 points and 11 assists for the Hawks, with Jalen Johnson adding 25 points, a career-high 16 rebounds, and seven assists in the victory. Tyrese Maxed tallied 35 points, nine assists, and eight rebounds for the 76ers in the losing effort. The Hawks improve to 15-21 in the regular season, while the 76ers fall to 23-13.
